title: Server support
body:
Would it be possible to get a server (drop down list, ect) option on clients to aid in searching for summoner profiles from other servers. 
As an Oceanic player, I originally came from NA and enjoyed being able to search "d scarra" or "dyrus" in the profiles, and see what the pros were doing. 

An example for what I am requesting would be adding the functionality of LOLking to the client, giving summoners the ability to look up players from around the world, with the client no matter what server is being played on.

(also not 100% sure if this fits the board, so if required leave a comment and I will adjust)

replies.body:
>(also not 100% sure if this fits the board, so if required leave a comment and I will adjust)

You're right; this is not the right board. Head over to [Player Creations](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations) and get yelled at for posting on the wrong board there. Or just go to [Miscellaneous](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) and be completely ignored. Your poison.

For the moment you're literally just best off using LolKing or the like. Think of it like the shoddy online Match History that forced you to open it in a browser.
